document_data.name: Chloe Asmanodel
document_data.mainbody: '''Chloe Asmanodel''' was a [[human]] [[bard]] working for the [[Harpers]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
Chloe was part of Harpers' operations against the [[Zhentarim]], [[Red Wizards of Thay]], [[Many-Arrows]], and the [[Frogmire Coven]]. She frequently took the role of the squad [[healer]].<ref group="note">According to the ''Onslaught''<nowiki>'s</nowiki> primary system and scenario designer Nicholas Yu's [https://boardgamegeek.com/blogpost/145527/dungeons-dragons-onslaught-designer-diary-2-harper Designer Diary #2].

Throughout her missions, she partnered with the other agents, including [[Abelio Mac Gabhann]], [[Drakmau Rockbiter]], [[Grabbleshanks]], [[Lightning-Dancer]], [[Sedonna Sparklebang]], [[Ayur]], [[Adnan Zarehm]], [[Eileen Rumrunner]]. and [[Nurith]].
